title: Orbit System
description: Spline based Orbital System for Actors, incl. Mass based Speed
longDescription:
With this Blueprint, you can create different Orbits, including Moons.

The Speed of each Actor in a orbit is calculated by the Mass Parameter of its Parent Object. This also applies to elliptical Orbits, where the Object changes it speed, depending on the distance to the Parent.


Orbits are created as Splines.


Videos:

Simple planetary Orbit System: https://youtu.be/LtX2aX88DkQ - https://youtu.be/BdJ7eEENpQc

Features: https://youtu.be/dtNjLXsaO7o

Basic Tutorial: https://youtu.be/fige6QRyrlw


Updates:

  • 1.0.1 - Fixed a small Bug with Orbit Names - March 15 2021
  • 1.0.2 - Fixed a Problem with scaling the Speed of Sub-Orbits - January 08 2022
  • 1.0.3 - Fixed a Problem with the Orbit Plane, after upgrading to UE5 - If you want to fix it yourself on an existing Project: Go to the "OrbitBuilder" Blueprint: “Construct Orbit Plane and Material” Function → "Make Vector" needs Z=1 instead of Z=0
  • 1.1.0 - Added dynamic Orbit Material (Planets can now have trails): https://youtu.be/BdJ7eEENpQc
  • 1.3.0 - Added Orbits Trails, that can be viewed from the Side too (Tessellation only works in UE 4 atm) - Optimized the construction of Splines. Even using only 2 Spline Points will work now. For good results use 4 or more. - Added Scaling for every Orbit individually. - Added easy method to change Orbit Speed during Gameplay.
  • 1.4.0 - Added new Plane Orbit Mesh and Material - Added High Quality Orbit Mesh for UE5 - Added another Orbit, that can be viewed from the side, that is cheaper in Performance - Some Optimizations - Fixed a Bug with using different Ticks (Using fixed Ticks like 0.1 should now give a similar result as real time).
  • 1.5.0 - Added the ability to jump to a time in the Future (in Seconds, during construction). - Fixed some minor Bugs.
  • 1.5.3- June 21 2023 - Fixed a problem that affected dynamic Orbit Materials on huge elliptical Orbits. Existing Materials should still work
  • 1.6.0 - December 2023 - Added several Scaling Options. Actors, Orbit Materials and Orbit Speed can now be all scaled along with the Orbit. - Fixed some Problems with dynamic Materials.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Spline based Orbits
  •  Moons for each Orbit (Moons for Moons are also possible)
  •  Orbit speeds are depending on the Distance to the central Mass
  • Elliptical Orbits have correct relative speeds (become faster, the closer they are, to the central Mass)
  • Ability to set the amount of rotations (days) an Actor has per Orbit (year)
  • Orbits can be rotated along all 3 axes
  • Actors can be rotated along all 3 axes
  • Orbit is represented by several Methods (simple Plane, high poly and lower poly meshes following the spline of the orbit)
  • Individual Scaling of the Orbit, Actors and Orbit-Speeds.


Number of Blueprints:

  • 1 Blueprint for the Orbit System
  • 6 Blueprints for the Demo Map



Feel free to suggest additional Features, that would be useful to you.



Network Replicated: No


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No
